title: During a call, how to start three-way calling? What about switching the call?
answer:
During the call, you can perform other operations at the bottom of the call interface: 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109963)

 Click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109964) to add a new call 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109965)

 During the call, you can combine calls and keep a call on hold. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109966)
